# Government Tender Announcement
-----------------------------

### Tender Title
------------

* English: **All Terrain Vehicles (ATV)**
* French: **Véhicules tout-terrain (VTT)**

### Tender Details
-----------------

* **Reference Number**: WS4167255296-Doc4167255357
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-24
* **Closing Date**: 2023-12-08, 14:00 EST

### Scope of Work
----------------

This procurement is for the provision of All Terrain Vehicles (ATV) by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) for POLICE operations in Nunavut. The vehicles will be used for various tasks, including patrol, transport of personnel, and search & rescue on different types of terrain including frozen remote lakes and rivers.

### Contract Details
-------------------

* **Expected Start Date**: 2023-12-15
* **Expected End Date**: 2025-11-01

### Trade Agreements
-----------------

This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
